scripts.bundle: npm link && bundle --platform ios && bundle --platform android && npm unlink
scripts.bundle-ios: npm link && bundle --platform ios && npm unlink
scripts.bundle-android: npm link && bundle --platform android && npm unlink
scripts.zip: npm link && bundle --platform ios -z -i --dest build --dest-zip build --dest-inline build && bundle --platform android -z -i --dest build --dest-zip build --dest-inline build && npm unlink
scripts.zip-ios: npm link && bundle --platform ios -z -i --dest build --dest-zip build --dest-inline build && npm unlink
scripts.zip-android: npm link && bundle --platform android -z -i --dest build --dest-zip build --dest-inline build && npm unlink
